message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be perfect for your needs.  I'm asking for $10,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $8,000 for it. Could we possibly meet in the middle?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for something a bit closer to my original price. Would you be willing to pay $9,000 for it?
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your price. I appreciate your flexibility. However, I am still unable to go above $8,000 for this product. Could we possibly come to an agreement at this price?
